jd: From: Arun Prasad, Teamware solutions arunprasad.g@twsol.com Reply to: arunprasad.g@twsol.com Location: Auburn Hills, MIClinton, MAMemphis, TNDuration: 12+ MonthsType: ContractMode: Onsite JOB DESCRIPTION: ·Relevant Experience Required: 8+ Years·Complete life cycle implementation of Manufacturing·Execution Systems (MES) on Siemens Opcenter.·Technical experience in Camstar MES, Object model extensions (Designer), Portal UI customizations, Database Understanding.·Strong experience with Camstar WCF services and Camstar Portal·Strong Experience in Other System (ERP) integration with Opcenter MIO·Knowledge of interfaces with the Camstar MES application and external applications like ERP, LIMS, Equipment, HMI etc.·Knowledge / Experience on other MES applications will be an added advantage.·Strong software development experience using Camstar, Microsoft .Net, ASP.Net, C# VB.NET, SQL Server·Strong Camstar XML/JSON interface experience.·Additional Domain experience in Metal Domain or Medical Devices and Pharma Manufacturing will be advantage·Ability to communicate clearly and accurately both orally and in writing.
